body: I ran the modified vet from @jonhoo over a very recent corpus of Go code. It found 1339 cases. The full results are here: https://gist.github.com/josharian/9895ee2c66147a6aa70d. I looked at a couple of them and didn't find anything that looked like a bug, just needless verbosity. (Please feel free to look through the list and demonstrate otherwise.) Given that, I'm inclined to say that this is a better fit for gofmt -ss than for vet. I opened #9983 for gofmt -ss.
